data.title: Tribal lands
data.excerpt: Water is a sacred and important resource to many tribal nations. It is vital to:  Tribal subsistence Cultural practices Health and welfare Agricultural production, and  Community and economic development.  The state partners with California Native American tribes to manage drought conditions and emergencies. In doing so, we respect tribal sovereignty and traditional drought resilience strategies. … Read more
data.author: Peggy Gartin
